body.name: IJO Handheld Bluetooth Karaoke Microphone-Kids Birthday Wireless Mic Singing Toys-Gifts for Age 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 10 Years Old Girls and Boys(Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 10 mins
features: Two Connection Options:Bluetooth connection and audio cable connection.Simply connect your phone(IOS or Android),iPad,computer with the cable or Bluetooth, select the song to play and start karaoke from the app.Can make you enjoy listening and singing anytime and anywhere.

The Package:The bluetooth karaoke microphone made with durable aluminum alloy material to withstand falls,impacts and crashes.Microphone bright color and beautiful package box.Include a microphone (The size is 1.1 inches x 3.0 inches x 2.0 inches x 8.8 inches.）and one charger.Kids Safey Design.

High Compatibility and Versatile Mixer:Is a 1800mAh large and 360°surround sound enhancement and a high-quality triple filter to reduce noise!There are multifunctional buttons for easy adjustment of presses, music volume,adjusting the mix and much more.Helps you find the perfect sound and gives you great sound quality.

Best Gift:This product suitable for all people over 3 years old and very useful at Party,KTV,Family Singing,Instrument Recording, Interviews or live ect.Also better choice gifts for festival (Christmas, Halloween,Valentine,New Year etc).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unexpected hit of Christmas
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my kids last minute as a stocking stuffer. We all ended up have sooo much fun. You can make your voice sound high or really low. Buy one! Probably could do karaoke with it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: She loves it easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: I'll start by saying this item was purchased weeks before christmas. It was shipped via prime and didn't arrive until days after Christmas.I purchased this for my 4 year old son as he LOVES to sing and hear himself lol. The product however is so cheaply made i mean it literally falls apart in your hand. The top part that you speak into screws onto the speaker part and the handle also screws into the speaker. It doesn't screw on flush and secure. The rechargeable battery literally sticks out of the bottom. If you push it up then the handle is no longer secure to the speaker part. Its constantly moving as you hold it. The battery moves out of place so the thing is always turning on and off. Every time you turn it on you have to hear " BLUETOOTH DEVICE IS READY TO PAIR" in a Chinese accent so thick I could barely make out what it was saying the first time I heard it. Lastly, the battery on this thing lasts like 10 minutes at full charge. It spends more time plugged up than it spends being used which is very frustrating for my 4 year old as he starts playing with it and 10 minutes later after repeated turning on and off from the battery moving then boom its dead and needs recharging. DO NOT BUY. Purchase a higher quality one because this one isn't it. Belongs in the dollar store...or the trash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars nice when its working
reviews.reviewText: I had to send them back, got 2 one was having battery issues. doesn't have clear instructions how to operate light features . they are bluetooth as in you can play music through the mic to sing with. My 2 and 5 yo love it so hey, they have multiple voice features too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cordless karaoke microphone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this for my Taylor swift obsessed 5 year old, she likes to put on “ concerts “ and wanted a microphone. This was cheaper than the prop ones that don’t echo or anything so I figured why not. However, the top isn’t fully attached, and easily comes undone. The instructions aren’t entirely clear..doesn’t give you any real direction on how to use all the features. The sound is a bit wonky, you need to put your mouth directly on the microphone to even hear yourself.The Bluetooth feature is very cool though, you can pick a song from Apple Music, YouTube, etc and it will play though the mic. But overall not overly impressed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these for my twin granddaughters they love it but their mom doesn't. It's an excellent gift especially if your grandkids don't live with you
